function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to UV radiation from mobile UV devices","Impact":"Harms inhabitants if not avoided","Mitigation":"Ensure the surrounding area is not exposed to UV radiation","Technologies":"Mobile UV devices with safety precautions","People":"Inhabitants and users of the device","Owner":"Users and building managers"},{"Description":"Ineffective or inadequate use of bipolar ionization devices","Impact":"Failure to prevent the spread of the virus in the air","Mitigation":"Proper installation and maintenance of bipolar ionization devices","Technologies":"Bipolar ionization devices","People":"Building engineers and maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Failure to detect viruses in buildings","Impact":"Inability to identify and isolate infected individuals","Mitigation":"Utilize virus-detecting bio sensors for early identification","Technologies":"Virus-detecting bio sensors","People":"Building occupants and management","Owner":"Building management"}]}
